name: startRange
description: Start from this date time

name: endRange
description: End on this date time

name: movementType
description:
Focus (Departure or Arrival) for the flights to be found;
used for selection of departure or arrival time within range
**Sorting is based on movementType
A = Arrival, D = Departure
If D- flights will be sorted by scheduleDeparture time
If A- flights will be sorted by scheduleArrivaltime

name: timeOriginType
description: S = Scheduled, M = Modified, I = Internal, P = Public

name: timeType
description:
Type of time used in startRange and endRange
U = UTC time, L = Local Time

name: origin
description: Departure airport

name: departureCity
description: IATA departure city code

name: destination
description: Destination airport

name: arrivalCity
description: Filter by airport code of arrival city

name: consumerHost
description: The information about the system from which the request is launched

name: carrierCode
description: Airline code (2-pos IATA and 3-pos ICAO)

name: operatingAirlineCode
description: Operating airline code (2-pos IATA and 3-pos ICAO)

name: flightNumber
description: Filter by flight number

name: operationalSuffix
description: Operational suffix, indicates if a flight has been advanced or delayed to the previous or next day

name: aircraftRegistration
description: Registration code of the aircraft

name: aircraftType
description: Filter by a type of aircraft

name: pageSize
description: Indicates the number of items per page

name: pageNumber
description: Indicates the page number you are requesting, the first page is page 0. If it's not provided first page will be returned

name: serviceType
description: IATA service type code

name: API-Key
description: Fill in API key for consumption
